title: Twisted Fate
body: I think he is right now very strong. And he is my go-to mid laner. He can roam like a boss with his ulti and stun card. He never have mana problems in lane and he have an very very strong burst. What do you guys think of him? And also he, in my opinion has the best lane clear because of red card.

replies.body: just fix his W so it actually applies to next auto, not having to wait a whole sec until it will apply

tf has always been a strong pick if you can play him mechanically well.

otherwise most people just feed hard.
Twisted Fate is the king of solo q. Red card is busted since you can just push the wave in at level 1 against champs that struggle with last hitting under tower, and they can't do shit

A good tf is a vey strong lane bully. An average tf gets minces by most easier to play mids. Luc syndra and ziggs are especially good vs him. Closer in champs like ahri lb and yas struggle vs his yellow card.
